question:
Saanvi picked some flowers, and Mateo picked the same number of flowers. Fill in the blank to make the statement equal.
3 - ___ = 4 - 2

Saanvi saw some butterflies, and Mateo saw a few more butterflies. Fill in the blank to make the statement equal.
8 - 3 = ___ - 4

Saanvi sat for a little while on the garden bench, and Mateo sat for the same amount of time. Fill in the blank to make the statement equal.
9 - 3 = ___ - 0

Saanvi took some pictures, and Mateo took a few pictures too. Fill in the blank to make the statement equal.
5 - 5 = 7 - __

Saanvi spotted some birds, and Mateo spotted the same number of birds. Fill in the blank to make the statement equal.
12 - ___ = 17 - 7

Saanvi picked some sunflowers, and Mateo picked the same number. Fill in the blank to make the statement equal.
___ - 4 = 16 - 12

Saanvi saw different types of flowers, and Mateo saw an equal amount. Fill in the blank to make the statement equal.
10 - ___ = 14 - 8

Saanvi counted some trees, and Mateo counted the same number of trees. Fill in the blank to make the statement equal.
8 - ___ = 9 - 4

Saanvi drew some sketches, and Mateo drew the same number of sketches. Fill in the blank to make the statement equal.
___ - 7 = 15 - 4

Saanvi noticed some people, and Mateo noticed the same number of people. Fill in the blank to make the statement equal.
___ - 1 = 16 - 3
